name: My Room (TheGamer)
description:
Warning: This game contains scenes that are related to self-hatred, suicides, and depression. Some sounds are very loud. Please play with caution.

This is an experimental game I made for a game jam, A Dark Room. I was wondering if I can make a story-driven game in this game jam, unlike any other games I've ever made. So yes, this is experimental. Also, I want to try making another horror game, even if it's not too horrific.

Controls: Only arrow keys and space
